description: This is a web application that allows you to convert Excel and PDF files into interactive charts. You can upload your files, and the application will process them to generate visual representations of your data.
file_processing_error: Error processing file. Please try again.
file_not_supported: File type not supported. Please upload an Excel or PDF file.
file_upload_error: Error uploading file. Please try again.
chart_generation_error: Error generating chart. Please try again.
chart_not_available: Chart not available. Please upload a file first.
download_chart_error: Error downloading chart. Please try again.
chart_types: Column, Pie, Line, Bar, Area, Scatter, Combo, Funnel
contact_description: You can use the form below to send your requests, suggestions, or complaints.
message_success: Your message has been sent successfully!
message_error: An error occurred. Please try again.
